str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.
Without, outside. Adverb from ek; out(-side, of doors), literally or figuratively.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as aer; a yard; by implication, a mansion.
And, even, also, namely.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
A female slave, maidservant, maid, young girl. Feminine diminutive of pais; a girl, i.e., a female slave or servant.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
And, even, also, namely.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A Galilean, an inhabitant of Galilee. From Galilaia; Galilean or belonging to Galilea.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
